mapper.select: SELECT FID, MNAME FROM FRIEND F, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = F.FID AND F.MID = #{mid} ORDER BY FID
SELECT FID, MNAME FROM FRIEND F, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = F.FID AND F.MID = #{mid} AND MNAME LIKE '%'||#{mname}||'%' ORDER BY FID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRIEND WHERE MID = #{mid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT F2.MID, MNAME,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRIEND F1 WHERE F1.MID = #{mid} AND F1.FID = F2.MID) EXISTENT FROM FRIEND F2, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = F2.FID AND F2.FID = #{mid})
SELECT F2.MID, MNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRIEND F1 WHERE F1.MID = #{mid} AND F1.FID = F2.MID) EXISTENT FROM FRIEND F2, MEMBER M WHERE M.MID = F2.FID AND F2.FID = #{mid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRIEND WHERE MID = #{mid} AND FID = #{fid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FRIEND WHERE MID = #{mid} AND FID = #{fid}
